title: Hillary Clinton referred to the assassination of the Korean Armed Forces as a reason to continue the 2008 campaign
subtitle: Hillary Clinton quoted 2008 about the assassination of RFK back in 2016, but Clinton did not escape criticism for commenting at the time that it did.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The assassination of Robert F. Kennedy in June 1968 was cited by Hillary Clinton as a reason to remain in the presidential race against Barack Obama in 2008.
